column4: Hi, I am trying to install Ubuntu 7.04 on a laptop ( ASUS PRO31S), installation keeps falls to a shell -- (initramfs) and I cannot proceed further. Could any one help?
does it give you any errors?
have you tried booting with "debugging options" like nodma or noapic?
sorry, I'm out of ideas, I've seen many people complain about the same problem, but haven't seen any fixes to it
